column1: Morifinwë was the father-name of Caranthir
column2: the fourth Sons of Fëanor of Fëanor. It means "Dark Finwë"
column3: a reference to his dark hair. The Quenya word was formed using the noun more
column5: which became mori- when added to his grandfathers name
column7: The names of the Sons of Fëanor with the legend of the fate of Amrod
